name: Dinari AZN
description: The Dinari AZN dShares token (AZN.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in AstraZeneca PLC, a leading global biopharmaceutical company focused on developing life-changing medicines in areas such as oncology, cardiovascular, and respiratory diseases. Each AZN.d token is fully collateralized by a corresponding AstraZeneca share held securely in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, AZN.d provides investors with easy access to AstraZeneca shares, offering features like 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlements, and enhanced liquidity.
